name: The Mortician
description:
You play as the Free Mortician, an accidental creation by THE Mortician (the world's 3rd most powerful dark artist).

Follow his instructions, kill the GMC anomalies and save the day.

CONTROLS:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim, Shoot
R - Reload
F - Interact
Q/E and Mousewheel - Switch Weapons
CTRL - Dodge
Shift - Sprint
Space - Jump
C - Crouch
ESC - Pause
